sentences.sentence: I was lucky enough to have my tuition covered by a lottery-funded scholarship called HOPE (Helping Outstanding Pupils Educationally).
sentences.translation: 我很幸运，由彩票资助的希望奖学金（即在教育方面帮扶优秀学生）支付了我的学费。

sentences.sentence: The national tests were educationally unsound.
sentences.translation: 全国考试从教育上来讲是错误的。

sentences.sentence: Children living in inner-city areas may be educationally disadvantaged.
sentences.translation: 居住在市中心贫民区的孩子在教育方面可能处于不利的地位。
